name: UpdateTicketTypeAttribute
description:
Updates an existing attribute for a ticket type.

Use this tool to modify the attributes of a specific ticket type in Intercom by providing the ticket type and attribute IDs.

parameters.name: ticket_type_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the ticket type provided by Intercom.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the ticket type which is given by Intercom.

parameters.name: ticket_attribute_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the ticket type attribute given by Intercom.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the ticket type attribute which is given by Intercom.

parameters.name: intercom_api_version
parameters.description: Specify the Intercom API version to use. Accepted values are '1.0' to '2.9'.

parameters.name: attribute_update_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details of the ticket type attribute to update, such as name, description, visibility, requirement status, etc.

name.description: The name of the ticket type attribute

description.description: The description of the attribute presented to the teammate or contact

required_to_create.description: Whether the attribute is required to be filled in when teammates are creating the ticket in Inbox.

required_to_create_for_contacts.description: Whether the attribute is required to be filled in when contacts are creating the ticket in Messenger.

visible_on_create.description: Whether the attribute is visible to teammates when creating a ticket in Inbox.

visible_to_contacts.description: Whether the attribute is visible to contacts when creating a ticket in Messenger.

multiline.description: Whether the attribute allows multiple lines of text (only applicable to string attributes)

list_items.description: A comma delimited list of items for the attribute value (only applicable to list attributes)

allow_multiple_values.description: Whether the attribute allows multiple files to be attached to it (only applicable to file attributes)

archived.description: Whether the attribute should be archived and not shown during creation of the ticket (it will still be present on previously created tickets)

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Intercom API

parameters.name: ticket_type_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the ticket type which is given by Intercom.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the ticket type which is given by Intercom.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the ticket type attribute which is given by Intercom.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier for the ticket type attribute which is given by Intercom.

name.description: The name of the ticket type attribute

description.description: The description of the attribute presented to the teammate or contact

required_to_create.description: Whether the attribute is required to be filled in when teammates are creating the ticket in Inbox.

required_to_create_for_contacts.description: Whether the attribute is required to be filled in when contacts are creating the ticket in Messenger.

visible_on_create.description: Whether the attribute is visible to teammates when creating a ticket in Inbox.

visible_to_contacts.description: Whether the attribute is visible to contacts when creating a ticket in Messenger.

multiline.description: Whether the attribute allows multiple lines of text (only applicable to string attributes)

list_items.description: A comma delimited list of items for the attribute value (only applicable to list attributes)

allow_multiple_values.description: Whether the attribute allows multiple files to be attached to it (only applicable to file attributes)

archived.description: Whether the attribute should be archived and not shown during creation of the ticket (it will still be present on previously created tickets)

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
